response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it will add significant value to your operations. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $12,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. Should you decide to proceed, this opportunity could provide you with a competitive edge in your field. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
